ABOUT Me

Hi there, I’m Tshireletso Johannes.

Fresh-faced and enthusiastic, I'm a recent addition to the engineering scene, brimming with excitement and ready to make my mark. While I may be new to the industry, my hunger for knowledge and passion for problem-solving drive me to tackle challenges with determination and creativity. I thrive in dynamic environments where I can absorb new information and apply it to real-world scenarios, always eager to learn from experienced mentors and peers. With a keen eye for innovation and a natural curiosity for emerging technologies, I'm poised to bring a fresh perspective and energy to every project I undertake.

I love my work and enjoy each new project as I get it. Feel free to have a look at my portfolio and don’t hesitate to contact me if you think I can be of service to you.

Thanks for stopping by!
